channel.title: [PI] Quest text [PI]
channel.description: I had a cool idea. Idk if it is possible though. Basically my server has hover text right now where my name is (the owner name). Instead of that I wanted to put text there that said my name. But it would be Red when I'm offline. and green when I'm online. Possible?

item.title: [PI] Quest text [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

you’ll find it in client.java

and It would be something like this:

(Just search for whatever text your quest tab is displaying)

if (playerName.equals("sk8rdude461") && (p.disconnected)) {
getPA().sendFrame126("@red@sk8rdude461, 16026);
} else {
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@sk8rdude461, 16027);
}

Might not work, as I’ve done it off the top of my head and I’m not exactly a pro at this… but It’s a starting point I guess.

Obviously might need to change your playername and 16026/16027 to the ones your replacing.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest text [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:2, topic:427422”]Yes it’s possible.
It’s basically the same as servers that have messages which say ‘***** has just logged in.’
Only yours would change the colour of text rather than displaying a message.[/quote]
Well. I don’t really know where you change quest text in PI’s. What file, and how do I make it swap?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest text [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Yes it’s possible.
It’s basically the same as servers that have messages which say ‘***** has just logged in.’

Only yours would change the colour of text rather than displaying a message.

Read full topic
